title: Peter Jackson & ME
description: Director Peter Jackson hangs out with me & my Travelers for "Trip Flip - New Zealand" and talks about New Zealand, The Hobbit, Lord of the Rings, his new movie The Hobbit: Battle of the Five Armies, and he coaches me on how to get a job on his next film!
